Class CSysTypeConv

java.lang.Object
  de.systemagmbh.common.util.CSysTypeConv
public class CSysTypeConv
extends Object

This class contains some methods that convert the given object into an instance of another class.

Method Detail

getType

public static int getType(Class cl)
Get the type of class ISysTypes for the given Class.

Returns:
the type or -1 if no type was found.

getClass

public static Class getClass(int type)
Get the Class for the given type. The type must be a valid value of ISysTypes. Otherwise 'null' is returned. For ISysTypes.TYPE_NULL also 'null' is returned.

Parameters:
type - One of the ISysTypes.
Returns:
the Class for the given type or null.
